page.title: 07HOUSING
page.content: The majority of people own their homes, and are very conscious of burglary, but prefer dogs and "multiple" locks to alarm systems. Most gardens are used mainly, or entirely, for decorative purposes. There are no new building developments. The houses are mostly pre_1939 and do not have double_glazing and cavity_wall insulation. Most houses do have inside toilets, bathroom, refridgerator, central heating,garage, telephone and loft insulation. Most of the houses are semi_detatched. Most council tenants think that the houses are adequately maintained, especially externally. The average number of rooms per house is seven. Few private landlords operate in the area.
